nodes.text: Widdle Warrick, also known as Willy, was a reckless young Ewok hunter from Bright Tree Village on the moon Endor, and he was the brother of Weechee and Wicket W. Warrick. Along with another Ewok named Wunka, Widdle helped the Wookiee warrior Chewbacca hijack an AT-ST walker crewed by Major Newland and Blanaid.
